long_description: The high-visibility REI Tech-Compatible Powerflyte Neon gloves are a great weight for cool-weather runs, and the special threads in the thumbs and forefingers let you use your touch-screen device. Powerflyte material blends polyester, nylon and spandex for a great fit and outstanding dexterity; fabric breathes well, dries fast and provides good warmth. Tech-compatible forefinger and thumb threads let you operate your touch-screen device without taking the gloves off. Bright neon increases your visibility in low light. Stretchy fabric of the REI Tech-Compatible Powerflyte Neon gloves conforms to the shape of your hands for a great fit.
